about_the_game:
Engage in a little alternate reality and fly across the Pacific Theater in 15 of the most famous, infamous, ad experimental planes from WWII Europe!

  • Spitfire*
  • Hurricane*
  • Meteor
  • Bf-109*
  • Bf-110*
  • Fw-190*
  • Yak-3*
  • Tempest*
  • Typhoon
  • Whirlwind
  • Beaufighter*
  • Swordfish
  • P-215
  • Me-262
  • He-219

*denotes a plane that can be upgraded in game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows XP (SP2)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon X2 4000+
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro, 256MB, Shader Model 3.0+ Graphics Card
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:4 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
